results.text: You can move as silently as a shadow across a wall. Creatures attempting to detect you by hearing have disadvantage on their checks for the next minute.
You see an opening, but only if you move fast. You may immediately use your reaction to Dash while sneaking.

You lead the way, showing your friends exactly where to go to avoid detection. You and any allies within 10 feet of you are under the effects of the spell @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.zlsdqrnf2t9thns7]{Pass Without Trace} for the next minute.
You are like a chameleon, capable of melting into your surroundings. Creatures attempting to detect you by sight have disadvantage on their checks for the next minute.

You quickly cobble together a means of camouflage with things that are within easy reach, even if you’re in the process of running. You gain an expertise die to checks made to hide yourself in the current biome for the next 24 hours.
You’ve mastered the ability to avoid detection. You have advantage on your next Stealth check.
